functions.name: ColorValue
functions.description: Returns the color value for the given color string.

parameters.name: colorstring
parameters.description: The color string to convert to a color value.

constraints.colorstring: Must be a valid color string.

errors.message: The parameter must be a valid color string.

functions.name: ColorValue_UO
functions.description: Returns the color value for the given untyped object.

parameters.name: colorstring
parameters.description: The untyped object to convert to a color value.

constraints.colorstring: Must be a valid untyped object.

errors.message: The parameter must be a valid untyped object.
